title: Tricolor Children Books
description: Tricolor children books are educational mini-comics (7 Pages) for kids. Mohit wrote 10 comics for the tricolor series (2010-2011) and one of the comics Jungle King featured on RC website & FB page. Tricolor series is still published by Raja Pocket Books with works by creatives like Swapnil, Ishan Trivedi, Sadia Artist etc.
author: Mohit Sharma
